website_summaries.verdict: The HP Envy 27 27-inch monitor is not only aesthetically pleasing, it delivers rich colors and premium audio quality courtesy of Dr. Dre's Beats Audio technology.It's also more expensive than most 27-inch monitors.

customer_reviews.title: Not Good w/ my MacBook
customer_reviews.text: Tried to hook this up, via Thunderbolt to HDMI, to my MacBook Pro (circa 2012), and the picture was horrible. Fonts were fairly unreadable - at least I would not have wanted to read on this monitor for any length of time (say, over 2 minutes). Overall picture was fuzzy and certainly not HD. This appears to be a Mac to monitor problem. When I called HP, they were very helpful, but in the end it came down to that there are no drivers for the Mac, so they could not help. I did not try the VGA connection since I specifically bought this for HDMI hookup.
customer_reviews.author: Flap Jack

customer_reviews.title: Great picture, not so great sound bar.
customer_reviews.text: Love this screen! It is fabulous and such a great, high quality picture. Sadly, the sound Beats bar is crap...so that was disappointing but I already had speakers with a subwoofer...yet was hoping to eliminate that but this isn't even half as decent in sound....But I do love the large screen and qualify of image! Surely comparable to my Mac retina screens...so overall great!
customer_reviews.author: Rie McHargue

customer_reviews.title: Good general purpose pc monitor
customer_reviews.text: Overall good monitor. Image appears clear and bright as needed. My only minor complaints are accessing some of the common front panel controls, in particular volume, require more front panel button presses than should be necessary and volume control for the built in speakers. I run this with Beats enabled and the subwoofer ( on and the audio is generally good but I find myself having to adjust the volume when playing video/audio from different sites/sources. Also, sometimes there doesn't seem to be much of a difference between volume at 10 or up to 20 making the volume setting somewhat misleading.
customer_reviews.author: Adam McClintock

customer_reviews.text: Speakers don't work....HP sending a new monitor as a replacement. Screen is amazing! Clear and crisp images that reduce eye strain.

customer_reviews.text: I love this monitor. I would advise this purchase to anyone looking for a larger screen. No problems. Just great.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda J. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: You won’t be disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two HP monitors within a week of each other. There wasn’t a problem with either of them, I just needed monitors at separate locations. I purchased a 25” HP and this 27” Envy. I really wish I had purchased two of the Envys. The extra 2” is worth the extra price (if you can afford it). The colors and picture quality are excellent, but what I like the best is how clear and sharp text is. Do yourself a favor and get this monitor.

customer_reviews.title: Spoil Yourself
customer_reviews.text: Life is about wants and needs. This was a want. Like having a Big Screen Television hooked up to my computer. Fast, sharp and clear and the intregrated Beats Speakers give great sound. Life's to short not to spoil yourself. I deserve it. Do you?

customer_reviews.title: Don't hesitate
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with my purchase. The image quality is great, must use the VGA Connection for best quality. Had to purchase a dvi to VGA cable.

customer_reviews.title: I own 2 of them, both are busted.
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these a year ago. First one started malfunctioning last June. Now the other one is failing. Terrible. I paid $650 a piece for these back then, total loss. I'll be submitting for warranty return but what to do without a monitor...compute in the dark?!?! Also the beats speakers suck on both. They sound good while they work but every few minutes they'd produce a deafening sqawk. I had to disable them. (Using HDMI audio passthrough, volume was low but squawk was always full volume.) I've had better luck with cheap monitors. DO NOT BUY!!!
customer_reviews.author: Yogi
